column5: Short walk to TAMU Kyle Field. Hear the crowd roar outside in the pool. Beautiful 6 bedroom, 4 1/2 bathroom home a block from A&M. Large entertainment area with game room. Two king beds, two queens, 1 double-shares room with 1 king-perfect for family, two twins, and one room with single bed. There are also two twin fold out ottomans in the large family room .Historic area. Discount available for multiple game bookings. $3,000 a weekend with half stay deposit plus $200 cleaning fee.
